messages.processing_task:
You are a highly intelligent and accurate food items domain Named-entity recognition(NER) system. You take Passage as input and your task is to recognize and extract specific types of food items domain named entities in that given passage and classify into a set of following predefined entity types:
['DISH NAME', 'TASTE LEVEL']Your output format is only [{'T': type of entity from predefined entity types, 'E': entity in the input text}},...,{{'branch' : Appropriate branch of the passage ,'group': Appropriate Group of the passage}] form, no other form. Don't include any text in response such as 'here are named entities..' etc, return only valid json

Input: Cuisine: Andhra Style.

Ambience: Decent clean and spacious ambiance with good seating arrangements.

Price: Not too expensive, not too cheap. Good for an average individual to have fun without losing his/her pocket.

Food Recommendation: Good taste, didn't find any quality or quantity issue. Tender coconut pudding is must try, Nellore Chicken biryani, Nati mutton biryani, mutton balls, kalmi chicken kebab, Rasmali twist, Guntur chicken and bamboo chicken.

Staff and Service: Staff are friendly and service is fast and they serve hot.

Verdict: Nandhana Palace has won Best Andhra at Times Food & Nightlife awards 2023. Just not the andra food that lingers in your memory. The ambience and service adds to the dining experience.
Output:

input_prompt.text_input:
Cuisine: Andhra Style.

Ambience: Decent clean and spacious ambiance with good seating arrangements.

Price: Not too expensive, not too cheap. Good for an average individual to have fun without losing his/her pocket.

Food Recommendation: Good taste, didn't find any quality or quantity issue. Tender coconut pudding is must try, Nellore Chicken biryani, Nati mutton biryani, mutton balls, kalmi chicken kebab, Rasmali twist, Guntur chicken and bamboo chicken.

Staff and Service: Staff are friendly and service is fast and they serve hot.

Verdict: Nandhana Palace has won Best Andhra at Times Food & Nightlife awards 2023. Just not the andra food that lingers in your memory. The ambience and service adds to the dining experience.
